name: Something is Missing...
storyline: The princess of Sarasaland usually wears bright, beautiful colors. But right now, Daisy seems to be missing all those different shades. You can help her out by adding the right colors to the right spots in this paint-by-number activity!
summary: A generic paint-by-numbers game starring Princess Daisy from the Super Mario Bros. franchise, made for the Play Nintendo promotional website.
